info.description: Retrieve position information of different currency pairs
info.title: API to retrieve position information of different currency pair

get.summary: Retrieves position information for the given currency pair
get.description: Retrieves the position in the given currency pair and the revalued(marked-to market) profit/loss

parameters.name: currencyPair
parameters.description: Identifies the currency pair. Ex: USDCHF, USDGBP

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: positionType
parameters.description: Identifies the position type. Possible values are CAS(cash position), GAP(Interest mismatch position), FXP(Foreign exchange position)

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: buyDate
parameters.description: Value date of the buy currency.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: positionPeriod
parameters.description: Identifies the period for which position is retrieved. Possible values are SPOT, FORWARD

parameters.name: counterpartyName
parameters.description: The counterparty name for the forex deal.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.summary: Retrieves the position details for the given currency pair and calender
get.description: Retrieves the position in the currency pair and the revalued(marked-to market) profit/loss

parameters.name: currencyPair
parameters.description: Identifies the currency pair. Ex: USDCHF, USDGBP

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: positionType
parameters.description: Identifies the position type. Possible values are CAS(cash position), GAP(Interest mismatch position), FXP(Foreign exchange position)

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: buyDate
parameters.description: Value date of the buy currency.

parameters.name: buyDateFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value date in a range while retrieving the position.

parameters.name: buyDateTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value date in a range while retrieving the position.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: dealDateFrom
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: dealDateTo
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: positionPeriod
parameters.description: Identifies the period for which position is retrieved. Possible values are SPOT, FORWARD

parameters.name: counterpartyName
parameters.description: The counterparty name for the forex deal.

parameters.name: calendar
parameters.description: Identifies the calendar to be used for the spreading of different position data into different time buckets. Ex: CAL-Standard calendar and DE1-Deutsche calendar

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.summary: Retrieves the live market rate from a given rate feed
get.description: Retrieves the live market rate from a given rate feed and displays the rate provider for a given currency pair

parameters.name: currencyPair
parameters.description: Identifies the currency pair. Ex: USDCHF, USDGBP

parameters.name: rateSource
parameters.description: The market rates source in general. In the case of currency rate, whether rate is to be sourced from  currency table (front office) or from market rates table (back office).

parameters.name: rateProvider
parameters.description: The market rate provider, e.g. Bloomberg, Reuters, etc.

parameters.name: assetType
parameters.description: Type of the asset, e.g. FX, equity, etc.

parameters.name: dateOrPeriod
parameters.description: Refers to a date or a given period.

parameters.name: rateIndicator
parameters.description: Market rate indicator as per the asset class. For currency, it  will be buy rate(B) , sell rate(S) or mid rate(M).

parameters.name: interpolationMethod
parameters.description: Identifies whether forward exchange rates are to be interpolated or not. Possible values are 'Blank' - Rate will be interpolated '1' - Takes the next available rate '2' - Takes the closest rate

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.summary: Retrieves position information for the currency pair outstanding deals
get.description: Retrieves the position of all the currency pairs and the revalued(marked-to market) profit/loss

parameters.name: currencyPair
parameters.description: Identifies the currency pair. Ex: USDCHF, USDGBP

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: positionType
parameters.description: Identifies the position type. Possible values are CAS(cash position), GAP(Interest mismatch position), FXP(Foreign exchange position)

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: buyDate
parameters.description: Value date of the buy currency.

parameters.name: buyDateFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value date in a range while retrieving the position.

parameters.name: buyDateTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value date in a range while retrieving the position.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: dealDateFrom
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: dealDateTo
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: positionPeriod
parameters.description: Identifies the period for which position is retrieved. Possible values are SPOT, FORWARD

parameters.name: counterpartyName
parameters.description: The counterparty name for the forex deal.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

currencyPair.description: Identifies the currency pair. Ex: USDCHF, USDGBP

currecy1Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency one.

currency2Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency two.

revaluationRate.description: The rate used to revalue the currency positions.

profitAndLossInCurrency2.description: Currency (other than local currency) in which profit and loss is expressed.

profitAndLossInLocalCurrency.description: The local currency in which profit and loss is expressed.

profitAndLossInRevaluationCurrency.description: Currency (other than local currency) in which profit and loss is expressed.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

calendarPeriod.description: The calendar period used for consolidating the data into different time buckets.

currecy1Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency one.

currency2Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency two.

revaluationRate.description: The rate used to revalue the currency positions.

profitLossCurrency2.description: Currency (other than local currency) in which profit and loss is expressed.

profitLossLocalCurrency.description: The local currency in which profit and loss is expressed.

profitLossInRevaluationCurrency.description: Currency (other than local currency) in which profit and loss is expressed.

rateSource.description: The market rates source in general. In the case of currency rate, whether rate is to be sourced from  currency table (front office) or from market rates table (back office).

rateProvider.description: The market rate provider, e.g. Bloomberg, Reuters, etc.

currencyOrPair.description: A single currency or a currency pair.

assetType.description: Type of the asset, e.g. FX, equity, etc.

dateOrPeriod.description: Refers to a date or a given period.

rateIndicator.description: Market rate indicator as per the asset class. For currency, it  will be buy rate(B) , sell rate(S) or mid rate(M).

interpolationMarker.description: The method used for interpolation to derive currency forward rates.

dealType.description: Foreign Exchange deal type. Allowed values: - SP(spot) - FW(forward) - SW(Swap)

counterparty.description: The counterparty ID  for the  deal.

currecy1Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency one.

currency2Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency two.

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

dealer.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency position

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

currencyPair.description: Identifies the currency pair. Ex: USDCHF, USDGBP

quotationPips.description: Identifies the decimal displacement of percentage in points for a currency.

baseCurrencyDecimal.description: Identifies the decimal places of the base currency.

counterCurrencyDecimal.description: Identifies the decimal places of the counter currency.

preciousMetal.description: Identifies if the currency is a precious metal or not.

ndAllowedCcy.description: Identifies if the currency is allowed for NDF transaction as deal currency.

splitValueCcy.description: Identifies whether split value dated contracts are allowed for the currency or not.
